short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forces user-select property to be enabled on all elements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Enable User Select Chrome extension allows you to easily bypass text selection restrictions on web pages. Some websites disable text selection, preventing users from copying text. This extension forces the user-select property to be enabled on all elements, letting you select and copy text freely, even on pages that block it.

Features:
1. Enable Text Selection: Instantly unlock text selection on web pages that have restricted it.
2. Toggle Control: Easily toggle the feature on or off via the extensionâ€™s popup menu.
